Description: You slam your rough body against a creature, taking serious recoil damage. Make an attack roll against a target, dealing grass damage on a hit. On a hit, you also take a quarter of the damage dealt in typeless recoil damage.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
